name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Hana no Tou' by Shirakami Fubuki and Usada Pekora.
Performance of the song 'Otoko no Kunsho' by Inugami Korone and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: 僕を君に
subtitles.english: For you...

subtitles.original: まだ笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: ...I want you to keep smiling.

subtitles.original: 満たされない穴は
subtitles.english: The unfilled holes in my heart

subtitles.original: 脱線の会話や
subtitles.english: Were filled by derailed conversations

subtitles.original: 澄ましたポーズで
subtitles.english: And straight-faced poses

subtitles.original: これまでは埋めてきたけど
subtitles.english: That's how I've survived until now

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々を蹴飛ばして
subtitles.english: Kicking away those boring days

subtitles.original: 君と二人で
subtitles.english: Just the two of us

subtitles.original: この街中を
subtitles.english: Through this whole city

subtitles.original: 泳げたらそれはどれだけ
subtitles.english: If we could swim, how much...

subtitles.original: 素敵なことでしょう？
subtitles.english: ...wonderful that would be?

subtitles.original: 出したことないほど大きな
subtitles.english: With a voice louder than ever before

subtitles.original: 声でやっと君に伝わる
subtitles.english: It'll finally reach you

subtitles.original: 歪な声がきっとちょうどいいさ
subtitles.english: This distorted voice is surely just right

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Connecting the ends of the world

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った絵画をなぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the paintings on the window

subtitles.original: 一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Traveling the universe all alone

subtitles.original: それだけでも不自由ないけど
subtitles.english: I had no complaints about that, but...

subtitles.original: 僕は選んでみたいのさ
subtitles.english: I want to try choosing

subtitles.original: 逆様な心の空を
subtitles.english: The sky of an inverted heart

subtitles.original: 安全なループを今、
subtitles.english: This safe loop, right now,

subtitles.original: 書き換えて！
subtitles.english: Rewrite it!

subtitles.original: 君の手を握りしめたら
subtitles.english: Once I hold your hand tight

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: To this city that knows no loneliness

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくることはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: We probably won't be able to return ever again

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いながら
subtitles.english: Even if we get lost as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: 光も影も見に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go see both the light and the shadows

subtitles.original: 歌って聞かせてこの話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing to me the rest of this story

subtitles.original: 連れて行って見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me to stars I've never seen before

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Connecting the ends of the world

subtitles.original: つっぱることが男の
subtitles.english: Being a rebel is a man's...

subtitles.original: たった一つの勲章だって
subtitles.english: ...only true badge of honor

subtitles.original: この胸に信じて生きてきた
subtitles.english: That's what I've believed in all my life

subtitles.original: 泣きたくなるようなつらい時もあるけど
subtitles.english: There are times so painful I want to cry

subtitles.original: いつも俺達がんばってきた
subtitles.english: But we've always kept on fighting

subtitles.original: 時の重さに流されそうになった時らも
subtitles.english: Even when the weight of time tried to sweep us away

subtitles.original: 歯をくいしばりたえてきた
subtitles.english: We gritted our teeth and endured

subtitles.original: ガキの頃路地裏で見た
subtitles.english: In the back alleys of our youth

subtitles.original: 夜空にキラめいていた
subtitles.english: Sparkling in the night sky

subtitles.original: 流れる星を見て
subtitles.english: Looking up at the shooting stars

subtitles.original: 誓った思いを忘れちゃいないぜ
subtitles.english: I haven't forgotten the oath I made

subtitles.original: つっぱることが男の
subtitles.english: Being a rebel is a man's...

subtitles.original: たった一つの勲章だって
subtitles.english: ...only true badge of honor

subtitles.original: この胸に信じて生きてきた
subtitles.english: That's what I've believed in all my life

subtitles.original: 氷のように冷たい世間の壁が
subtitles.english: The cold, ice-like walls of society

subtitles.original: いつもさえぎる俺たちの前を
subtitles.english: Are always blocking our path

subtitles.original: 胸にえがいたこの夢はハンパじゃないから
subtitles.english: Because this dream in my heart is no half-measure

subtitles.original: かじかむこの手握りしめ
subtitles.english: Grasping these numbing hands tight

subtitles.original: ガキの頃赤トンボ
subtitles.english: Like back when we were kids

subtitles.original: 追いかけてた時の
subtitles.english: Chasing after the red dragonflies
